ivardefs.name: code
ivardefs.desc: Indicates a meaning for the stratifier. This can be as simple as a unique identifier, or it can establish meaning in a broader context by drawing from a terminology, allowing stratifiers to be correlated across measures.

ivardefs.name: component_
ivardefs.desc: A component of the stratifier criteria for the measure report, specified as either the name of a valid CQL expression defined within a referenced library or a valid FHIR Resource Path.

ivardefs.name: criteria
ivardefs.desc: An expression that specifies the criteria for the stratifier. This is typically the name of an expression defined within a referenced library, but it may also be a path to a stratifier element.

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: The human readable description of this stratifier criteria.

properties.desc: The stratifier criteria for the measure report, specified as either the name of a valid CQL expression defined within a referenced library or a valid FHIR Resource Path.
